title: Sound On: Chauvin Verdict, Rep. Hayley Stevens
itunes:title: Sound On: Chauvin Verdict, Rep. Hayley Stevens
description:
Guests: Former Alaska Senator Mark Begich, Strategic Consulting Advisor at Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck, and Rep. Hayley Stevens, a Democrat representing Michigan's 11th congressional district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
